name: haccp-business-manager
description: Progressive Web App for HACCP food safety management in restaurants
author: HACCP Business Manager Team

scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:info && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:info && VITE_APP_ENV=development vite build --mode development
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:info && VITE_APP_ENV=staging vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:info && VITE_APP_ENV=production vite build --mode production
scripts.preview:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run preview
scripts.clean: rm -rf docs/asset/* && rm -rf node_modules/.vite && rm -rf src/generated
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && echo 'Development build ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && echo 'Staging build ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && echo 'Production build ready for deployment'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
